Package com.magnet.mobile.android

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MagnetActivity
    Extended Activity to support Services startup and data injection.
    MagnetAndroidService
    Abstract base for an Android Service.
    MagnetApplication
    Provides central place to startup and shutdown the microkernel for the android application.
    MagnetAsyncTask<I,P,V>
    The MagnetAsyncTask is an implementation and extension to the AsyncTask abstraction that can run on Android or other platforms.
    MagnetContentProvider  
    MagnetHandlerThread
    A helper class to register the Handler callback in a thread which also initializes the micro-kernel.
    MagnetIntentService
    Abstract base for an Android IntentService.
    MagnetListActivity  
    MagnetMobileClient
    MagnetMobileClient is a helper class which initializes kernel and basic connection services to the Magnet Management Server and Magnet Enterprise Server.
    MagnetTabActivity  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MagnetMobileClient.ConnectionState
    Enumeration for possible connection states that can be returned from getConnectionState()
